metadata.title: CVE-2024-42091 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe: Check pat.ops before dumping PAT settingsWe may leave pat.ops unset when running on brand new platform orwhen running as a VF.  While the former is unlikely, the latteris valid (future) use case and will cause NPD when someone willtry to dump PAT settings by debugfs.It's better to check pointer to pat.ops instead of specific .dumphook, as we have this hook always defined for every .ops variant.
